member.name: M:StarTelecom.Controllers.DeviceController.GetAllDevices
member.summary: Gets all devices in the database
member.returns: A list of all the devices
member.response: Returns a list of devices

member.name: M:StarTelecom.Controllers.DeviceController.GetDevice(System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets a single device using the device's id
member.param: GUID that identifies the device record
member.response: Returns the device object
If the device object is not found

member.name: M:StarTelecom.Controllers.PhonePlanController.GetPhonePlans
member.summary: Gets all phone plans in the database
